name: One Star
description:
One Star - space 2D shooter.
In the game waiting for you will find a lot of space battles against with enemy races. Destroy the enemies to get money and improve your spaceship. Attack the enemy's station to win and earn cosmic domination.

The game features:
  • 12 original starship.
  • 5 starship improvements.
  • The battles with small ships and huge liners.
  • Many beautiful planets filling the star system.

Space battles are waiting for you!
